releaseNotes:
Version 1.11.6
			- Added public async Task SetDeviceCustomPropertyAsync(int deviceId, string name, string value, SetPropertyMode mode = SetPropertyMode.Automatic, CancellationToken? cancellationToken = null)
			- Added public async Task PatchAsync<T>(T entity, Dictionary<string, object> fieldsToUpdate, CancellationToken? cancellationToken = null) where T : IPatchable

			Version 1.11.4
			- Changed logging to use ILogger.  More fixes for version 101

			Version 1.11.3
			- Updated for version 101

			Version 1.11.2
			- Added Trace capabilities

			Version 1.11.1
			- Added System.Diagnostics TraceWarnings when rate limiting is invoked.

			Version 1.11.0
			- All async calls within the library are now called with ConfigureAwait(false), to prevent deadlocks.

			Version 1.10.2
			- Fixed GetAlertsAsync when MonitorObjectId is set

			Version 1.10.1
			- Cache implemented for PostAsync

			Version 1.10.0
			- Netflow functions fixed for new LogicMonitor REST API changes

			Version 1.9.12
			- Bug fixes

			Version 1.9.11
			- Cache performance gains

			Version 1.9.10
			- Fixed cache ageing

			Version 1.9.9
			- Improved cache stability

			Version 1.9.8
			- Made GetGraphDataAsync() cancellation token optional

			Version 1.9.7
			- Added cancellation token to GetGraphDataAsync()

			Version 1.9.6
			- Added cancellation token to GetAppliesToAsync()

			Version 1.9.5
			- Added rate limiting

			Version 1.9.4
			- Modified EventSource property names

			Version 1.9.3
			- Added EventSource filters

			Version 1.9.2
			- Added a lot of EventSource methods on PortalClient
			- Corrections for v100
			- Some minor breakage due to corrections

			Version 1.9.1
			- Removed erroneous NewtonSoft 1.11 requirement

			Version 1.9.0
			- Renamed various incorrectly-named AlertInterval properties
			- Added GetDataSourceXmlAsync(int dataSourceId)

			Version 1.8.11
			- Improved PortalClient.PutAsync() LogicMonitor error response handling

			Version 1.8.10
			- Added ServiceGroupCreationDto, DashboardGroupCreationDto
			- Added ReportGroup, Report and ReportGroupCreationDto

			Version 1.8.9
			- Added PortalClient.GetDeviceDataSourceInstanceDataPointConfigurations(int deviceId, int deviceDataSourceId, int deviceDataSourceInstanceId, CancellationToken? cancellationToken = null)

			Version 1.8.8
			- Added PortalClient.DeleteAsyncSetDeviceDataSourceInstanceGroupDataPointThresholds(int deviceId, int deviceDataSourceId, int deviceDataSourceInstanceGroupId, int dataPointId, string alertExpression, string alertExpressionNote)

			Version 1.8.7
			- Added PortalClient.DeleteAsync(DeviceDataSourceInstance deviceDataSourceInstance)

			Version 1.8.6
			- Fixed an issue affecting PortalClient.GetDeviceProcesses()
			- Added PortalClient.PollNowAsync()

			Version 1.8.5
			- v.94 support
			- Added several class properties

			Version 1.8.4
			- Fixed broken PortalClient.GetDeviceByDisplayNameAsync()
			- Added several AWS device group types

			Version 1.8.3
			- Fixed issue with sdt alert filters

			Version 1.8.2
			- Fixed issue with groupsDisabledThisSource

			Version 1.8.1
			- Fixed issue with GetDeviceGroupDataPointConfigurationAsync caused by LogicMonitor endpoint path change

			Version 1.8.0
			Improvements
			- Now targets .NET Standard 2.0
			- Nullable cancellation token support for all PortalClient HTTP calls
			- AccessId/AccessKeySupport e.g. var portalClient = new PortalClient("subdomain", "accessid", "accesskey");
			- Support for all v93 fields
			Breaking changes:
			- OpsNotes all now use the OpsNote class
			- The System.Drawing.Image namespace is no longer used - images are instead returned as byte arrays.  To use this:

			Image image;
			using (var ms = new MemoryStream(await DefaultPortalClient.GetImageByteArrayAsync(imageType)))
			{
			image = Image.FromStream(ms, true, true);
			}

			Version 1.7.6
			Fixed an issue with Debug commands

			Version 1.7.5
			Added CancellationToken support for Debug commands

			Version 1.7.4
			Fixed an issue with ExecuteDebugCommandAndWaitForResultAsync where some queries did not succeed

			Version 1.7.3
			Fixed issue whereby DeviceDataSources would not be returned if the "groupsDisabledThisSource" JSON property was set.

			Version 1.7.2
			Added support for DeviceGroupTypes: Azure/ApplicationGateway and Azure/IoTHub

			Version 1.7.1
			Further improvements to Widget support

			Version 1.7.0
			Some breaking changes after a full review of all fields and classes.
			This is a major new release - we should now have full support for all widgets.
			It is no longer possible to bring back widgets attached to Dashboards.  Please use a second call to retrieve widgets.

			Version 1.6.10
			Fixed time-based escalation chains

			Version 1.6.9
			Fixed broken GetAll<SnmpSysOidMap>()

Version 1.6.8
Uses the REST LogicMonitor API.
Version 1.6 of the API introduces a number of breaking changes over v1.5:
- The "ConfigSources" and "DataSources" namespaces have now been combined into one "LogicModules" namespace.
- The Backup objects reflect this change.
title: LogicMonitor.Api
